summary: This is the Chinese translation of the original Monster Wars mod.
descriptionHtml:
This is the Chinese translated version of the original Monster Wars. 
Original page:http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/18997
All credit to the original author Ironman5000.

introduction
This mod has been made to dramatically enhance the game while using dogtown1\'s Monster Mod by adding several features, it follows the same kind of concept as Oblivion\'s MMM and New Vegas\'s AWOP with lots of features.

For more information, please refer to the original mod, or read the Chinesized instruction.

Chinese Version Info
I did two Chinese translation -- Chinese Simplified and Chinese Tranditional. Please use it accordingly. Also I completely translate the original instruction, please read it carefully before you install and play with this MOD.

Installation
This is only a Chinese .esp file , please go to original page to download the .bsa file.
Please use the NMM to install the MOD.

Credit
All credit with Ironman5000, thank him for this great MOD!

If you like this MOD, please endorse the author, thank you!

About our group
ARROW&KNEE MOD TEAMâ„¢  is a neutral independent mini-group for Original MOD lovers,if you have ability to  use some specialized software such as PS,max,nifskope,mudbox,zb,maya and so on , please contact us.
Our contact information: skyrimmodteam@gmail.com
OR, you can directly PM me here.
author: Ironman5000
